revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: Office of the United States Direct Tax Commission,

I am directed by the Attorney General to acknowledge the receipt of your letter of the 22d inst. relative to certain suits against the Freedmen in the parish of St. Helena, S. C., and to say that it has been referred to the Secretary of War.
